channel.title: Development on Scratch3-Tello
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Scratch3-Tello

item.title: Build Environment
item.description: Build Environment # The scratch3-tello repository contains the diffs between the scratch-vm and scratch-gui repositories in file units. Therefore, you cannot just clone this repository and build it. Requirements # wget git node.js npm Create a working folder # $ mkdir scratch3-tello $ cd scratch3-tello Download the script to build an environment # $ wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kebhr/scratch3-tello/master/build.sh $ chmod +x build.sh Run the script to build an environment # $ .

item.title: Internationalization
item.description: Internationalization # Block names are defined in scratch-vm/src/extensions/scratch3_tello/index.js. The message object described in this file will be used by i18n. message['internal block code']['language code'] is the block name in that language for that block. Pull-Requests are always welcome to add or update translation. Example # Translate the takeoff block into German. At the moment, message['takeoff'] looks like this const message = { takeoff: { 'ja': '離陸する', 'ja-Hira': 'りりくする', 'en': 'takeoff', }, .
